title: D/C from a game in progress but there was no game in the beginning?
body:
Hey guys, something weird just happened to me in game. idk if you guys had this issue b4:


So, right around 5:30pm today I was in a solo q game (13ish minutes in). Suddenly I got disconnected with the "attempting to reconnect message" but when I pressed "quit game", some how I immediately ended back to the client page and still could start a new game. There was no indication that I was ever in a game in the beginning (no match history, no lp lost gain ). Any thoughts guys?

replies.body: It sounds like the gameserver your match was being hosted on may have encountered a hiccup. If you experience this again, please let me know.
